ygData.subject: Re: L 11 song and L21+ sites?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Jedi mind trick.  :-) I am an outstanding citizen.  You can trust me. -- John H. Kim kim@stormhaven.org
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 14 Jun 1999, Brandon Kassebaum wrote:
>
> I have found that the most usefull aspect of the level 11
> song is its ability to grant the singer quests. Using
> this song I can attempt or recieve any good aligned
> races/classes quest. I have tried this in several cities
> and know that it is the truth. I try and hail the person,
> talk a bit and they give a "once you are in better
> standing then we will talk" message. Sing the level 11
> song then repeat the last quest cue. Voila! instant
> quest. :)

Jedi mind trick. :-)

"I am an outstanding citizen. You can trust me."
--
John H. Kim
kim@...
